title: The.Passion.of.Joan.of.Arc.1928.DVDRip.Messiaen.soundtrack
description:
The Passion of Joan of Arc (1928)
 
French title: La Passion de Jeanne d'Arc

Carl Theodor Dreyer

Dvd Rip from the Criterion Collection's digital restoration

with a new, inedited soundtrack*

AVI (Generic MPEG-4)
Codec: Xvid
Resolution: 640x480
Frame rate: 24.25 fps
Data size: 1.27 GB
Data rate: 2171.71 kbits/s
Audio: Stereo, 44.100 kHz
French title cards 
English, Spanish subtitles (srt)
Duration:  1:22:19

*ABOUT THIS SOUNDTRACK:
We feel that the various musical scores 'inspired' by this unique film, when set as its soundtrack, they tend to distract rather than enhance our perceptions of Dreyer's intense, affecting, masterful movie.

The following new, inedited soundtrack has been composed with extracts of various works by OLIVIER MESSIAEN, musician, mystic and ornithologist, who never intended to...
